title: Embracing the EO Effect - our four year journey | Torchbox

metadata.description: This Friday we'll join in celebrating the 11th annual EO Day, which unites employee-owners and advocates of employee ownership from all over the UK. Lisa takes a moment to reflect on our journey over the past year and shine a light on the positive impact of employee ownership.
